name: rkbalgi.github.io
body:
Welcome to my github pages. You will find here some link to interesting or amusing things I've read (or as a marker for myself).

I'm a software developer working at a large IT services company in Bangalore, India. I work for a payments/financial client based in the US (more of that at my linkedin account). I mostly work with and around the java ecosystem but, have dabbled with pretty much anything that's caught my attention (more recently scala, go).

1 [The chicken soup/paracetamol cartoon](./201311_0905_ahefa.jpg) :-)
1 Some of my older blog posts can be found [here](http://raghablog.blogspot.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
